languages.text: "В служении Ему найдут они силу и стойкость. Только так отвратят сердца свои от слабостей, что ведут к ересям".
"In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."
languages.original_text: "В служении Ему найдут они силу и стойкость. Только так отвратят сердца свои от слабостей, что ведут к ересям".

traits.locale_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “通过侍奉帝皇，人们会寻得力量和坚毅。只有通过这样的侍奉，他们的心灵才能远离那些招致异端腐化的弱点。”
languages.original_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."

traits.locale_text: “通过侍奉帝皇，人们会寻得力量和坚毅。只有通过这样的侍奉，他们的心灵才能远离那些招致异端腐化的弱点。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Être à Son service leur donnera force et courage. Alors seulement, détourneront-ils leur cœur de ces défaillances qui mènent à l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."

traits.locale_text: « Être à Son service leur donnera force et courage. Alors seulement, détourneront-ils leur cœur de ces défaillances qui mènent à l'hérésie. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "In seinem Dienst werden sie Kraft und Stärke finden. Erst dann werden sie ihre Herzen von den Schwächen abwenden, die zur Ketzerei führen."
languages.original_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."

traits.locale_text: "In seinem Dienst werden sie Kraft und Stärke finden. Erst dann werden sie ihre Herzen von den Schwächen abwenden, die zur Ketzerei führen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「皇帝にお仕えしていると思えば、強さと不屈がみなぎるもの。異端に堕ちる弱さを退ける心を取り戻すには、それしかない」
languages.original_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝にお仕えしていると思えば、強さと不屈がみなぎるもの。異端に堕ちる弱さを退ける心を取り戻すには、それしかない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Al servicio del Emperador encontrarán fuerza y resistencia. Solo así podrán alejar sus corazones de la fragilidad que conduce a la herejía».
languages.original_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."

traits.locale_text: «Al servicio del Emperador encontrarán fuerza y resistencia. Solo así podrán alejar sus corazones de la fragilidad que conduce a la herejía».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."

languages.text: "O'na hizmet ettikçe güç ve metanet bulacaklar. Ancak bu şekilde, kendilerini kâfirliğe sürükleyen zaaflardan arınabilirler."
languages.original_text: "In His service will they find strength and fortitude. Only thus will they turn their hearts away from the frailties that lead to heresies."

traits.locale_text: "O'na hizmet ettikçe güce ve izzete ulaşacak, kendilerini kâfirliğe sürükleyen zaaflardan arınmış olacaklar."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
